Posts.Content: It's been 2 1/2 years since my last chemo treatment. I can finally say that I am feeling back to normal, with my energy level and strength. I to am a very active person, trying to do seveal things at once. I have learned to slow down and ask family for help. They love the idea that they can finally do something for me once. Hang in there and take care of yourself and your body.
Posts.Title: when do the aches and pains go away?
